alert.note: Alert for Northampton (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 02 at 8:35PM EDT until June 02 at 9:15PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wakefield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Northampton County in eastern Virginia... * Until 915 PM EDT. * At 835 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Cape Charles, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Cheriton and Bay View around 845 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Capeville, Townsend, Kiptopeke State Park, Oyster, Cheapside, Kiptopeke, Plantation and Dalbys. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 757-899-2415, posting to the NWS Wakefield Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSWAKEFIELDVA.
